Title: Skinny Dipper
Writer: Matthew Miller (created by), Chris Fedak (teleplay by), Chris Fedak (story by), Phil Klemmer (story by)
Actors: Ioan Gruffudd, Alana De La Garza, Joel David Moore, Donnie Keshawarz
Plot: Henry's mysterious anonymous caller confronts him by framing him for a murder. With the police closing in he is faced with the prospect of having to either leave town or confess his true nature to everyone.
